annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: This interface provides a capability to set the spin speed level.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: Maximum value allowed for the spin speed level setting.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: Target set-point value of spin speed level.

annotation.name: org.alljoyn.Bus.DocString.En
annotation.value: List of the values of spin speed level which can be selected.
